title: Just Falafel - Al Barsha
typeOfFood: Lacto, Fast food, Take-out, Middle Eastern, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Franchise chain was originally veg but added meat to its menu. Offers falafel sandwiches in different international flavors. Dairy and cheese is used, so vegans need to specify. Opposite City Max hotel, near Dubai American Academy, behind MOE.
